credit_line: Interdepartmental transfer from Williams College Archives and Special Collections, Gift of Margaret Howe and Samuel Scoville
title: Indian youth and girl wrapped in a blanket with another youth standing near by
medium: pen and ink | watercolor | pencil on paper
inscriptions: on verso in pencil: The two youth and one/girl. and this/youth Sport.  mar 9"/80/Elkman/E.P.H. Ashley
